General.Name: Shrinkflex (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Shrinkflex (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of PVC and PET shrink sleeve labels in Thailand. It offers shrinkable packaging by gravure and digital process. The company also provides stretch film products; and consulting services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chachoengsao, Thailand.
